note.note-paragraph: This subclass covers equipment for similar use in hotels, dressing rooms, vehicles, or the like, not otherwise provided for

The following IPC groups are not in the CPC scheme. The subject matter for these IPC groups is classified in the following CPC groups:
A47G25/42 covered by A47G25/40, A47G2025/4092
A47G25/46 covered by A47G25/44, A47G2025/448
A47G25/64 covered by A47G25/62, A47G2025/629
A47G29/02 covered by A47B97/001
In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.

Group A47G29/1209 is impacted by reclassification into groups A47G29/12095 and A47G29/12097.
